ingredients: 5 lbs 12.0 oz - Pale Malt (2 Row) Bel (3.0 SRM) (Grain)
3 lbs - Extra Light Dry Extract (3.0 SRM) (Grain)
5 lbs 8.0 oz - Wheat Liquid Extract (8.0 SRM) (Grain)
3.0 oz - Goldings, East Kent [5.0%] - Boil 60 min (Hops)
2.0 oz - Goldings, East Kent [5.0%] - Boil 10 min (Hops)
2.0 oz - Goldings, East Kent [5.0%] - Dry Hop 6 days (Hops)
name: White Orca Ale Clone
